wikipedia_page.main: Mark McMahon is a Scottish born indoor and lawn bowls player, who has represented England, Hong Kong and Australia at international level.

response: Gillett won the 2001 World Indoor Bowls Championship pairs title in Great Yarmouth with bowls partner Mark McMahon. Sixteen years later he won his second title when he won the Open pairs with Jason Greenslade at the 2017 World Indoor Bowls Championship in Great Yarmouth.
Her husband Bill McMahon is also an international lawn bowler and her son is Mark McMahon.
His wife Rosemary McMahon is also an international lawn bowler and his son is Mark McMahon.
